metadata.title: South Horizon Got Music? T-Shirt (Adult Sizes)
features: Made in the USA and Imported

FABRIC AND COMFORT: 100% Preshrunk ring spun Cotton. Heather Grey is 90/10 cotton/polyester; Dark Heather is 36/65 cotton/polyester. Double needle stitching on sleeves and bottom hem. Easy Tear label for maximum comfort
FITTING: These are Adult sizes. Youth sizes are available under separate listings. Semi-fitted Unisex Style. Not too boxy like the old-style shirts

DETAIL SIZE MEASUREMENTS: Available on 2nd photo and under Product Description area below. For a loose fit, order the next size up. Since this is a cotton shirt, it will shrink just a little in the wash
QUALITY PRINTING: Printed with top quality inks that result in vibrant print colors and resist to fading and cracking
Designed and printed with the highest quality standards in USA
description: These are Adult Size Shirts. Youth sizes available under a separate listing.
All Measurements are in inches. MeasuredÂ with shirt laid flat on a table.
